about.descriptionHeader: Film enthusiasts – you’re in the right place!
about.description: Tired of endless scrolling and not finding anything worthwhile to watch? So are we. With kinolime, you get to make the next call. Dive into a library of new film concepts and cast your vote on what you would want to see produced. It’s that simple. And free

intro: A one-of-a-kind platform that brings movie lovers, writers, and producers together to create the next perfect film together. It’s our mission to make it easy for new film or series concepts to get noticed and produced. Get in the mix with the kinolime community and be part of the movement, where you get to

readersAndViewers.slogan: Film enthusiasts – you’re in the right place!
readersAndViewers.description: With kinolime, you get access to new film concepts – and you decide what gets produced! Drive into a library spanning scripts, readings and pilots and cast your vote. It’s that simple. And free.
readersAndViewers.slogan2: What are you waiting for? Get started today.
readersAndViewers.access: Get access to early film concepts
readersAndViewers.stream: Stream hours of free audio readings to get a deeper immersion
readersAndViewers.updates: Receive updates as your project gets made
readersAndViewers.ahead: Get first viewer access ahead of theatrical

screenWriters.title: screen writers
screenWriters.text1: Have the perfect film script and need to get it in front of an audience? With kinolime, you get access to a broad audience who can help your concept build momentum. Submit your script. Let the audience vote. And if they love it – we’ll help you get it made.

producers.title: producers
producers.text1: You’re a producer in search for the next real gem of a script. We’re a platform with collection of projects that already have an audience following.
producers.text2: With kinolime, you’ll get access to quality new, production-ready scripts that the audience is already in love with. Join in and make your next film happen.

whyJoin.info: Take a fresh approach to getting your project noticed and produced. Let the kinolime community of film enthusiasts give your script a boost – and see where it takes you!

cardItem1.text: Your voice matters. Get access to hours of free content – and updates on your project while it’s in production.

cardItem2.text: Put your script in front of a highly targeted audience for optimum exposure.

cardItem3.text: Get in an early access quality projects with momentum and audience interest.

system.pdfOnlyErrorMessage: You can only upload PDF file!

review-form.confirm: If you confirm that this is a script, click Approve , if you do not agree, select Reject and specify the reason in the comments.
review-form.indicateTheReason: indicate the reason for the rejection

review.title: Review
review.subTitle: Should Kinolime Invest in this Script?
